source:
# DevOps Automation Workflow

This workflow demonstrates common DevOps tasks using shell commands.

⚠️ **Note**: Some commands may require specific tools to be installed.

# Check system information
echo "System Information:"
uname -a
echo ""
echo "Current directory:"
pwd

# List files in current directory
echo "Files in current directory:"
ls -lah

# Check disk usage
echo "Disk usage:"
df -h | head -5

## Customization

Edit the cells above to run your own automation tasks:
- Deploy applications
- Run health checks
- Execute maintenance scripts
- Monitor system resources
